mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SYS_LIKE ( TargetServiceType, TargetID, LikeType, Emoticon, Point, RegisterCode, RegistDate, Reserved1, Reserved2, Reserved3 ) VALUES ( #{targetServiceType}, #{targetID}, #{likeType}, #{emoticon}, #{point}, #{registerCode}, SYSDATE, #{reserved1}, #{reserved2}, #{reserved3} )
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT RESULT.* FROM ( SELECT E.EventID AS "PrimaryID" , ED.DateID AS "SecondaryID" , 'Schedule' AS "TargetServiceType" , E.FolderID AS "TargetID" , FN_BASEGETDICTIONARY_S(#{lang},SOF.MultiDisplayName) AS "FolderName" , E.Subject AS "Subject" , E.Description AS "Description" , E.RegistDate AS "RegistDate" , TO_CHAR(E.RegistDate, 'YYYY.MM.DD')AS "CreateDate" , E.RegisterCode AS "RegisterCode" , (SELECT FN_BASEGETDICTIONARY_S(#{lang}, MultiDisplayName) FROM SYS_OBJECT_USER WHERE UserCode = E.RegisterCode) AS "RegisterName" , (SELECT NVL(PhotoPath, '') FROM SYS_OBJECT_USER WHERE UserCode = E.RegisterCode) AS "PhotoPath" , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SYS_COMMENT WHERE TargetServiceType='Schedule' AND TargetID = E.EventID||'_'||ED.DateID AND DeleteDate IS NULL)AS "CommentCnt" , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SYS_LIKE WHERE TargetServiceType='Schedule' AND TargetID = E.EventID||'_'||ED.DateID)AS "RecommendCnt" , '' AS "FileID" , ED.StartDate AS "StartDate" , ED.EndDate AS "EndDate" , ED.IsRepeat AS "IsRepeat" , TO_CHAR(ED.RepeatID) AS "RepeatID" , TO_CHAR(E.Place) AS "Place" , '' AS "MenuID" FROM event E INNER JOIN EVENT_DATE ED ON ( E.EventID = ED.EventID ) INNER JOIN SYS_OBJECT_FOLDER SOF ON ( SOF.FolderID = E.FolderID ) WHERE 1=1 AND (TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') - E.RegistDate) < #{limitDay} AND (E.IsPublic = 'Y' OR E.RegisterCode = #{userCode} ) AND E.DeleteDate IS NULL AND E.IsDisplay = 'Y' AND SOF.DeleteDate IS NULL AND SOF.IsUse = 'Y' AND SOF.FolderID IN (SELECT TargetID FROM SYS_SUBSCRIPTION WHERE TargetServiceType = 'Schedule' AND RegisterCode = #{userCode})
UNION ALL
SELECT BM.MessageID AS "PrimaryID" , BM.Version AS "SecondaryID" , 'Board' AS "TargetServiceType" , BM.FolderID AS "TargetID" , FN_BASEGETDICTIONARY_S(#{lang},SOF.MultiDisplayName) AS "FolderName" , BM.Subject AS "Subject" , TO_CLOB(BM.BodyText) AS "Description" , BM.RegistDate AS "RegistDate" , TO_CHAR(BM.RegistDate, 'YYYY.MM.DD')AS "CreateDate" , BM.CreatorCode AS "RegisterCode" , FN_BASEGETDICTIONARY_S(#{lang}, BM.CreatorName) AS "RegisterName" , (SELECT NVL(PhotoPath, '') FROM SYS_OBJECT_USER WHERE UserCode = BM.CreatorCode) AS "PhotoPath" , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SYS_COMMENT WHERE TargetServiceType IN ('Board', 'Doc', 'Community') AND TargetID = BM.MessageID||'_'||BM.Version AND DeleteDate IS NULL) AS "CommentCnt" , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SYS_LIKE WHERE TargetServiceType IN ('Board', 'Doc', 'Community') AND TargetID = BM.MessageID||'_'||BM.Version) AS "RecommendCnt" , TO_CHAR((SELECT MAX(FileID) FROM SYS_FILE WHERE ObjectType ='FD' AND ObjectID = BM.FolderID AND MessageID = BM.MessageID AND SaveType='IMAGE')) AS "FileID" , '' AS "StartDate" , '' AS "EndDate" , '' AS "IsRepeat" , '' AS "RepeatID" , '' AS "Place" , TO_CHAR(SOF.MenuID) AS "MenuID" FROM BOARD_MESSAGE BM INNER JOIN SYS_OBJECT_FOLDER SOF ON ( SOF.FolderID = BM.FolderID ) LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS_OBJECT_USER SOU ON BM.CreatorCode = SOU.UserCode LEFT OUTER JOIN board_config BC ON (BC.FolderID = SOF.FolderID) LEFT OUTER JOIN board_config_default BCD ON (BCD.FolderType = SOF.FolderType) WHERE 1=1 AND SOF.IsUse = 'Y' AND SOF.DeleteDate IS NULL AND BM.MsgState IN ('C', 'A') AND BM.MsgType != 'S' AND NVL(BC.UseSubscription, BCD.UseSubscription) = 'Y' AND (BM.UseSecurity != 'Y' OR (BM.UseSecurity = 'Y' AND BM.CreatorCode = #{userCode})) AND (BM.ReservationDate IS NULL OR BM.ReservationDate < SYSDATE) AND BM.DeleteDate IS NULL AND NVL(BM.SecurityLevel,999) >= (SELECT SecurityLevel FROM SYS_OBJECT_USER WHERE UserCode = #{userCode}) AND (TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') - BM.RegistDate) < #{limitDay} AND DECODE(SOF.FolderType , 'OneToOne', DECODE(BM.OwnerCode,#{userCode} ,'',(SELECT OwnerCode FROM SYS_OBJECT_FOLDER WHERE FolderID = #{userCode} AND OwnerCode LIKE '%'||#{userCode}||'%') ) , 1) = 1 AND SOF.FolderID IN (SELECT TargetID FROM SYS_SUBSCRIPTION WHERE TargetServiceType = 'Board' AND RegisterCode = #{userCode}) ) RESULT
WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY "RegistDate" DESC )RESULT1
WHERE ROWNUM <= #{limitCount}

SELECT F.FavoriteID AS "FavoriteID" , F.TargetServiceType AS "TargetServiceType" , F.TargetObjectType AS "TargetObjectType" , F.TargetURL AS "TargetURL" , FN_BASEGETDICTIONARY_S(#{lang}, SOF.MultiDisplayName) AS "DisplayName" FROM SYS_FAVORITE F LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS_OBJECT_FOLDER SOF ON (F.TargetID = SOF.FolderID) LEFT OUTER JOIN board_config BC ON (BC.FolderID = SOF.FolderID) LEFT OUTER JOIN board_config_default BCD ON (BCD.FolderType = SOF.FolderType) WHERE UserCode = #{userCode} AND SOF.DeleteDate IS NULL AND SOF.IsUse = 'Y'
AND SOF.FolderID IN
#{item}
AND NVL(BC.UseFavorite, BCD.UseFavorite) = 'Y'
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO SYS_FAVORITE(TargetObjectType, TargetServiceType, TargetID, TargetURL, UserCode) VALUES
( #{targetObjectType}, #{targetServiceType}, #{item}, #{targetURL}, #{userCode} )
INSERT INTO SYS_SENSING_ORG(UserCode, SelectedType, SelectedCode, SubSystem) VALUES(#{userCode}, 'UR', #{selectedCode}, ' ')
mapper.select: SELECT A.UserCode AS "UserCode" , A.SelectedCode AS "SelectedCode" , A.SelectedType AS "SelectedType" , B.DisplayName AS "DisplayName" , B.PhotoPath AS "PhotoPath" , B.MailAddress AS "MailAddress" , B.Mobile AS "Mobile" , B.intPhoneNumber AS "intPhoneNumber" , B.intMobile AS "intMobile" , B.JobPositionName AS "JobPositionName" , B.MultiJobPositionName AS "MultiJobPositionName" , B.MultiJobLevelName AS "MultiJobLevelName" , B.MultiJobTitleName AS "MultiJobTitleName" , B.infoText AS "infoText" FROM SYS_SENSING_ORG A JOIN (SELECT A.UserCode , A.DisplayName , A.PhotoPath , A.MailAddress , A.Mobile , (CASE WHEN (A.PhoneNumber IS NULL) THEN '' ELSE '+82-'|| SUBSTR(A.PhoneNumber, 2, 12) END) AS intPhoneNumber , (CASE WHEN (A.Mobile IS NULL) THEN '' ELSE '+82-'||SUBSTR(A.Mobile, 2, 12) END) AS intMobile , B.JobPositionName AS JobPositionName , FN_BASEGETDICTIONARY_S(#{lang}, B.MultiJobPositionName) AS "MultiJobPositionName" , FN_BASEGETDICTIONARY_S(#{lang}, B.MultiJobLevelName) AS "MultiJobLevelName" , FN_BASEGETDICTIONARY_S(#{lang}, B.MultiJobTitleName) AS "MultiJobTitleName" , B.JobTitleName|| ' ('|| B.DeptName||')' AS infoText FROM SYS_OBJECT_USER A LEFT JOIN SYS_OBJECT_USER_BASEGROUP B ON A.UserCode = B.UserCode WHERE B.JobType = 'Origin' ) B ON A.SelectedCode = B.UserCode WHERE A.UserCode = #{userCode} AND SelectedType = 'UR' ORDER BY ModifyDate DESC
mapper.update:
UPDATE SYS_TODO SET IsComplete = #{isComplete},
Title = #{title},
Description = #{description},
ModifyDate = SYSDATE WHERE TodoID IN
#{todoId}
mapper.select:
SELECT a.AlarmID AS "AlarmID" , a.Category AS "Category" , a.Title AS "Title" , a.URL AS "URL" , a.PusherCode AS "PusherCode" , a.MsgType AS "MsgType" , FN_BASEGETDICTIONARY_S(#{lang}, b.MultiDisplayName) AS "PusherName" , FN_BASEGETDICTIONARY_S(#{lang}, c.MultiJobLevelName) AS "PusherJobLevel" , TO_CHAR(a.ReceivedDate, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI') AS "ReceivedDate" , a.IsRead AS "IsRead"
,CASE WHEN INSTR( a.URL, 'processID=' ) > 0 THEN ( SELECT jp.FormPrefix FROM jwf_process jp INNER JOIN jwf_processdescription jd ON jp.ProcessDescriptionID = jd.ProcessDescriptionID WHERE jp.ProcessID = SUBSTR( a.URL,INSTR( a.URL,'processID=')+10, INSTR( SUBSTR( a.URL,INSTR( a.URL,'processID=')+10),'&' )-1 ) ) ELSE NULL END AS FormPrefix
FROM SYS_ALARM_LIST a LEFT JOIN SYS_OBJECT_USER b ON a.PusherCode = b.UserCode LEFT JOIN SYS_OBJECT_USER_BASEGROUP c ON b.UserCode = c.UserCode AND c.JobType = 'Origin' WHERE a.UserCode = #{userID} AND a.IsRead = 'N' AND a.DeleteDate IS NULL AND a.ReceivedDate > sysdate - 14
AND ReservedInt1 is null
AND ReservedInt1 = -1
ORDER BY ReceivedDate DESC
mapper.update:
UPDATE SYS_ALARM_LIST SET IsNew = 'N' WHERE UserCode = #{userID} AND IsNew IS NULL
AND ReservedInt1 is null
AND ReservedInt1 = -1

UPDATE SYS_OBJECT_USER SET LogonPassword = CRYPTO.ENC_AES128(#{loginPassword}, #{aeskey}) , TEMPORARY_PASSWORD_ISUSE = 'Y' , PASSWORD_CHANGE_DATE = SYSDATE , ACCOUT_LOCK = 'N' WHERE DisplayName = #{name} AND LogonID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT SOF.MenuID AS "MenuID" , SOF.FolderID AS "FolderID" , Subject AS "Subject" , Version AS "Version" , MessageID AS "MessageID" , BM.CreatorCode AS "CreatorCode" FROM board_message BM INNER JOIN sys_object_folder SOF ON (SOF.FolderID = BM.FolderID) WHERE 1=1 AND MessageID = SUBSTR(#{targetID},0, INSTR(#{targetID},'_')-1) AND Version = SUBSTR(#{targetID},INSTR(#{targetID},'_')+1)

SELECT A.UserCode,CompanyCode,DeptCode,EmpNo,DisplayName,MultiDisplayName,MultiDeptName, ENTERDATE, Mobile FROM sys_object_user a INNER JOIN sys_object_user_basegroup b ON a.usercode = b.usercode WHERE a.usercode = #{objId} AND jobtype = 'Origin'
